name: GET_asm-suppressions
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all suppressions.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$ul: **created_at**: A UNIX timestamp indicating when the suppression was created.
**email**: The email address that was suppressed.
**group_id**: The id of the suppression group that this email address belongs to.
**group_name**: The name of the suppression group that this email address belongs to.
